entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `UseWindowsForms` causes token `Windows` to be clobbered in global scope. #39299
  • A/V crash in Comparer<SdkFeatureBand>.Default during dotnet new #42113
  • RHEL9: missing dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0-8.0.8 #43009
  • Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset download check fails because NuGetPackageRoot is unset in some scenarios #43016
  • Workloads are broken on Fedora 40 #44082
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set]With 9.0.104 SDK installed on win-x64, Warning "The specified version does not contain a valid major, minor, and patch version: '9.0.102.1' displays when switch back to loose manifests if workload set version is "9.0.102.1" #46946
  • File conflict when pack packages on Github Actions dotnet 10 preview 1 sdk #47269

Updated

  • Unable to install published 8.0 and 9.0 project using setup #47344
  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Unable to find directory for jdk 11.0.24; please make sure the tool is installed on this image. #45834
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • Unable to use `dotnet sln add` to add an esproj to a solution #36617
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Allow setting projects meant to only be used to not compile code as Non applicable for building. #15408
    Discussion
  • "dotnet restore" and "dotnet publish" use relative BaseIntermediateOutputPath even if it's set to absolute path #46990
  • dotnet watch crashes with "An unexpected error ocurred" #47392
  • Publishing native AOT fails on Fedora 40, Documentation suggests packages only for Ubuntu #42335
  • A combination of dotnet build and dotnet publish --no-build -p:PublishSingleFile=true does not work in .net8.0 #37367
  • PublishContainer + GeneratePackageOnBuild results in race #47429
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 10 preview 2 SDK installed, Some files are not identical in .exe installer and in .zip package. #47129
    10.0.1xx
  • Regression in dotnet publish using .NET 9 SDK 9.0.200 #47227
  • GenerateToolsSettingsFile causes incremental build issues #17454
    10.0.1xx
  • Encoded plus sign in image mediaType for container publish #47399
  • PrivateAssets="All" breaks Android apps #47332
  • Change in argument handling in `dotnet run` between 9.0.103 and 9.0.200 #46912
  • dotnet tool restore started failing on macOS with NU3037 and NU3028 errors after 11th February #46857
    9.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to the 9.0.3 release #47479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47475
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47473
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.3xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47472
    Area-Containers
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #47470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #47469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.104 March 2025 Updates #47466
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix global properties not propagating in new dotnet test for MTP #47464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `ForceDryRunSigning=true` on Mac & Linux signed builds #47461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build RuntimeAnalyzers in VMR #47459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47457
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use exe file if it exists in dotnet test #47454
    Area-dotnet test
  • Exit if restore/build failure in dotnet test #47450
    Area-dotnet test
  • [main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.2.25160.1 #47447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert changes to NativeAot test due to runtime update #47443
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.3xx] make container app/entrypoint argument defaults only happen on the RID-specific builds, not the outer RID-less build #47458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.2xx #47471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #47468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #47467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NuGetPackageDownloader: Stop verifying the package signature on Mac and queue off of the environment on Linux #47463
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47455
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47456
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make container app/entrypoint argument defaults only happen on the RID-specific builds, not the outer RID-less build #47424
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Opt-in to use dotnet.boot.js #47451
    Area-WasmSdk
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add project capabilities for publish properties #46221
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.15
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 9.0.4
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix MAUI static asset updates #47431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create logger directory if it doesn't exist in dotnet test #47411
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Add more logging to dotnet test tracing #47449
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [REF] SolutionProjectModel Full Paths #47422
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • CLI Utils: file-scoped namespaces and house-keeping #47430
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to Fix and Re-enable HasIncludedFiles Test #47220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wait for file change when process exits #47427
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.3xx

Updated

  • Permit specifying to use workload versions in global.json #47421
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Reworked asset comparison #47428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SDK-PR-guide.md to include inter-branch codeflow #47420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Generate the sdk msi bundles inside the VMR on windows BuildPass=2 verticals #47397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
